verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: asked] [ARG2: Republican Sen. Bob Corker] [ARG1: not to pursue legislation challenging tariffs on steel and aluminum] . Corker said he still plans to introduce the legislation along with other GOP senators .
